name: Shadow Puppets by Pak Suwardi
desc: Shadow puppets crafted by local artisans, created through a detailed process taking about one week. Frequently ordered by puppeteers for traditional art performances, introducing local culture to various audiences.

name: Dinda Hayu Batik
desc: Hand-drawn batik unique to the village, made manually by local artisans. Each motif represents the beauty of culture and surrounding nature, making it unique and highly artistic.

name: Arisoema Bag
desc: Handmade products such as bags, souvenir bags, wallets, and phone cases crafted with creativity and quality materials. Perfect for daily use or as unique gifts.

name: Nai's Kitchen
desc: A variety of snacks like snack boxes for events, savory and spicy chili oil dumplings, and traditional tapioca fritters with distinctive flavors, perfect for family treats.

name: Rice by Bu Rajinah
desc: Rice harvested from village fields, cultivated using traditional techniques. It has a soft texture and natural aroma, making it an excellent choice for families prioritizing quality food.

name: Fian Collection
desc: A garment business providing various clothing items such as t-shirts, Islamic dresses, and sportswear, made with quality cotton fabrics. Offers both press and manual screen printing services with custom designs.

name: Lopis by Bu Iwin
desc: Traditional village delicacies such as sweet and chewy lopis, soft cassava cakes, and glutinous rice with a tender texture, delivering the authentic warmth of local flavors.
